thread.title: Russell Wilson tried to run for a 1st down and got leveled by a Falcons defender
thread.title_full: Russell Wilson tried to run for a 1st down and got leveled by a Falcons defender

author: Louis Bien
title: Russell Wilson tried to run for a 1st down and got leveled by a Falcons defender
text:
Russell Wilson got punished for thinking he could possibly run on the Falcons’ defense.
Russell Wilson is having a hard time finding openings against the Falcons’ defense. His offensive line has been a sieve, forcing the quarterback to buy space with his feet. 
Facing a third-and-15 early in the fourth quarter, Wilson took off past the line of scrimmage in hopes of picking up the first down. A Falcons cornerback made sure Wilson landed WELL short of the marker.
That’s a helluva hit, clean and decisive. It represents what has so far been a dominant game by the Falcons over a traditionally strong postseason team.
